ygData.subject: Re: Level 30,35,40,45, and a "power level" comme
ygData.msgSnippet: Even though my guild does not have a large amount of bards... 4 or 5 i think, the one thing I enjoy the most is the maturity all of our members have.  Most of
ygData.messageBody:
Even though my guild does not have a large amount of bards... 4 or 5 i
think, the one thing I enjoy the most is the maturity all of our members
have. Most of them are 18-40s resulting in players with more mental
abilities than all of the kewldewds combined... which still isnt saying much
now that I think about it. point is, playing with older players is much
more enjoyable from an intellectual point of view.
Penaden Songweaver
and proud member of the Lost Order of Akalabeth

Llewrend Lynnhaven wrote:

> From: Llewrend Lynnhaven <lordartos@...>
>
> Only 26 here, but one thing I have noticed is that
> bards genrally are more mature players and better
> role-players than most other classes. Granted this is
> a genralization, but we are not the power gamer type
> character, we are the group type, the glue type. I
> like that. One reason I don't want other races to
> have bards is because I also like being rare. In my
> guild of 40, I'm one of two. I like that :)
